name: Missions Pilot: Police Helico
description:
Get ready for the rescue mission in the city. Police air force pilot, your job starts with helicopter simulator, flying high into the skies to complete the rescue missions. All pilots are not pro enough to handle this impossible task, but playing as the police helicopter pilot you need to bring out your pro skills to fly helicopter flight. The city needs someone to rescue them from recent fire and earthquakes. The fire relief tasks are in your hands. All construction works have been stopped & roads are blocked by heavy traffic.
Features:
- Real-time Helicopter flying in this Flight Simulator 3D
- Explore the City and Rescue Civilians
- Smooth Flight Handling, Navigation and Physics
- Thrill of flying Helicopter high in the Skies
- Realistic controls and option of helicopter to fly with some awesome airshow skills.
